name: Horror Game Made In 24 Hours
description:
Welcome to the horror game with no name, this is a text-based "horror" game (even though I wouldn't really call it one) I made in under 24 hours.

This game was created for a video on my channel "DHMelon".

The game has 7 endings and a little too many choices, enjoy! Also the game has a lot of cryptic messages that are currently impossible to understand, so enjoy!
